title: Love is an Accident
overview: Li Chuyue , a young actress, accidentally enters the "Yunwei Villa," the first manor in the Jianghu, and is mistaken for an assassin by the young master, An Jingzhao, who nearly died, but escaped in the nick of the time. An accidental "damsel in distress" situation moved An Jingzhao, but the road to making Chuyue his wife is long: There are not only love rivals everywhere, there is also a crisis to be solved. The two deal with the crisis in the Jianghu hand in hand and gradually grew affectionate towards each other, and the black hand behind the scenes gradually emerge ...
